abstract: Boston Bruins defeat New York Rangers, 4-3, in exhibition match; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Brad Marchand scored in the sixth round of a shootout to give the Boston Bruins a 4-3 home victory over the Rangers in exhibition play.

headline.main: Rangers Lose to Bruins in Exhibition Play
headline.print_headline: Rangers Lose to Bruins in Exhibition Play

snippet: Brad Marchand scored in the sixth round of a shootout to give the Boston Bruins a 4-3 home victory over the Rangers in exhibition play.
